name: 東方虹埴遇 ~ Multi-dimensional Convocation of Unexpected Genius
name_original: 東方虹埴遇 ~ Multi-dimensional Convocation of Unexpected Genius
description:
PLEASE READ THE "DETAILED INSTRUCTIONS" AT THE END!

東方虹埴遇 ~ Multi-dimensional Convocation of Unexpected Genius is a Touhou x Len'en x BNHA cross-over fangame made for Bullet Hell Engines's fifth iteration of the Bullet Hell Artistry contest.

The theme, "Unbelievable/Impossible Allies", tasked participants with making a bullet hell script featuring a Touhou character and a character from a non-Touhou video game working together to create fantastic patterns.

The current build of the game you will be downloading is an alpha build/proof of concept, containing only the minimum content required for the contest. It will receive multiple updates in the future, adding new content and optimizations/QoL changes.

It is highly recommended you read the BHA5_ReadMe text file in the game directory before playing, as it contains essential information such as basic controls and asset credits.

This build currently has no custom menu/package, and the game must be loaded & played through Danmakufu ph3sx's (the engine it was made in) default menu.

Detailed Instructions:

+ Open up th_dnh_ph3sx.exe (or its "Legacy" variant)

+ Go to the Stage section of the menu.

+ Select Boss Stage in the section.

+ Choose a player, a difficulty, and enjoy!

Until the next convocation...
